title: Stochastic simulation and applications in finance
overview: This elective course for third-year students in economics mathematics and financial mathematics provides theoretical foundations and techniques for random number generation, continuous and discrete random variable simulation, multivariate random distribution simulation, random process simulation, and variance reduction techniques in simulation. Throughout the course, students will practice simulation skills through various financial applications.

key_concepts: Continuous and discrete random variable simulation
